problem_names:
lemma bytes_takefill_rep_eq[code abstract]:
  "Rep_bytes (bytes_takefill b n bs) = takefill b n (Rep_bytes bs)"

lemma bytes_replicate_rep_eq[code abstract]:
  "Rep_bytes (bytes_replicate n b) = replicate n b"
translations:
lemma bytes_takefill_rep_eq[code abstract]:
  "Rep_bytes (bytes_takefill b n bs) = takefill b n (Rep_bytes bs)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Rep_bytes (bytes_takefill b n bs) = takefill b n (Rep_bytes bs)

proof (prove)
using this:
  Rep_bytes (bytes_takefill ?x ?xa ?xb) =
  takefill (Abs_uint8 (Rep_uint8 ?x)) ?xa (Rep_bytes ?xb)
  Abs_uint8 (Rep_uint8 ?x) = ?x

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Rep_bytes (bytes_takefill b n bs) = takefill b n (Rep_bytes bs)

lemma bytes_replicate_rep_eq[code abstract]:
  "Rep_bytes (bytes_replicate n b) = replicate n b"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Rep_bytes (bytes_replicate n b) = replicate n b

proof (prove)
using this:
  Rep_bytes (bytes_replicate ?x ?xa) =
  replicate ?x (Abs_uint8 (Rep_uint8 ?xa))
  Abs_uint8 (Rep_uint8 ?x) = ?x

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Rep_bytes (bytes_replicate n b) = replicate n b
